biotools.summary: Support vector machine recursive feature elimination (SVM-RFE) with correlation bias reduction. SVM-RFE is a powerful feature selection algorithm in bioinformatics. It is a good choice to avoid overfitting when the number of features is high.

bioschemas.name: SVM-RFE
